pageSetting.title: 机构趋势分析

attribute.value: select khzbdh as KEY,khzbmc as VALUE from khfa_khzb_jg order by zbpx

table.title: 考核指标_时间相同结果集
分析指标_时间相同结果集

select.isEqual: select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,yjzb.khzbmc,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join ( select yjzb.tjrq,yjzb.khdxdh, zb.khzbmc,zb.zbpx,yjzb.zbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and zb.bz = yjzb.bz and zb.sdbs = yjzb.sdbs and zb.tjkj = yjzb.tjkj where yjzb.tjrq between $qsrq$ and cast ($tjnf$||'1231' as integer) and yjzb.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and zb.khzbdh = $khzb$ union all select yjzb.tjrq,yjzb.khdxdh, zb.khzbmc,zb.zbpx,yjzb.zbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and zb.bz = yjzb.bz and zb.sdbs = yjzb.sdbs and zb.tjkj = yjzb.tjkj where yjzb.tjrq between cast($dbnf$||'0101' as integer) and $jsrq$ and yjzb.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and zb.khzbdh = $khzb$ ) yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh order by yjzb.tjrq asc,yjzb.zbpx

select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,zb.zbmc, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs,bz.bzzwmc as bz, dmms_tjkj.dmms as tjkj,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join ( select a.tjrq,a.zbdh,a.sdbs,a.bz,a.tjkj,a.khdxdh,a.zbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ a where a.tjrq between $qsrq$ and cast ($tjnf$||'1231' as integer) and a.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and a.bz = '$bz$' and a.sdbs='$sdbs$' and a.tjkj='$tjkj$' and a.zbdh = $zbdh$ union all select b.tjrq,b.zbdh,b.sdbs,b.bz,b.tjkj,b.khdxdh,b.zbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ b where b.tjrq between cast($dbnf$||'0101' as integer) and $jsrq$ and b.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and b.bz = '$bz$' and b.sdbs='$sdbs$' and b.tjkj='$tjkj$' and b.zbdh = $zbdh$ ) yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = yjzb.bz inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=zb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' inner join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz = yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc = 'ZBSDBS' inner join csb_dmms dmms_tjkj on dmms_tjkj.dmz = yjzb.tjkj and dmms_tjkj.dmmc = 'TJKJ' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh order by yjzb.tjrq asc,zb.zbpx

select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,zb.khzbmc,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join khfa_khzb_jg zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and zb.bz = yjzb.bz and zb.sdbs = yjzb.sdbs and zb.tjkj = yjzb.tjkj and zb.khzbdh = $khzb$ inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh where yjzb.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jg.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ order by yjzb.tjrq asc,zb.zbpx

select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,zb.zbmc, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs,bz.bzzwmc as bz, dmms_tjkj.dmms as tjkj,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = '$bz$' inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = yjzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs='$sdbs$' and yjzb.tjkj='$tjkj$' and yjzb.zbdh = $zbdh$ inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=zb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' inner join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz = yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc = 'ZBSDBS' inner join csb_dmms dmms_tjkj on dmms_tjkj.dmz = yjzb.tjkj and dmms_tjkj.dmmc = 'TJKJ' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh where yjzb.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jg.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ order by yjzb.tjrq asc,zb.zbpx

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,yjzb.khzbmc,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join ( select yjzb.tjrq,yjzb.khdxdh, zb.khzbmc,zb.zbpx,yjzb.zbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and zb.bz = yjzb.bz and zb.sdbs = yjzb.sdbs and zb.tjkj = yjzb.tjkj where yjzb.tjrq between $qsrq$ and cast ($tjnf$||'1231' as integer) and yjzb.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and zb.khzbdh = $khzb$ union all select yjzb.tjrq,yjzb.khdxdh, zb.khzbmc,zb.zbpx,yjzb.zbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and zb.bz = yjzb.bz and zb.sdbs = yjzb.sdbs and zb.tjkj = yjzb.tjkj where yjzb.tjrq between cast($dbnf$||'0101' as integer) and $jsrq$ and yjzb.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and zb.khzbdh = $khzb$ ) yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh order by yjzb.tjrq asc,yjzb.zbpx
select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,zb.zbmc, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs,bz.bzzwmc as bz, dmms_tjkj.dmms as tjkj,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join ( select a.tjrq,a.zbdh,a.sdbs,a.bz,a.tjkj,a.khdxdh,a.zbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ a where a.tjrq between $qsrq$ and cast ($tjnf$||'1231' as integer) and a.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and a.bz = '$bz$' and a.sdbs='$sdbs$' and a.tjkj='$tjkj$' and a.zbdh = $zbdh$ union all select b.tjrq,b.zbdh,b.sdbs,b.bz,b.tjkj,b.khdxdh,b.zbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ b where b.tjrq between cast($dbnf$||'0101' as integer) and $jsrq$ and b.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ and b.bz = '$bz$' and b.sdbs='$sdbs$' and b.tjkj='$tjkj$' and b.zbdh = $zbdh$ ) yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = yjzb.bz inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=zb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' inner join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz = yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc = 'ZBSDBS' inner join csb_dmms dmms_tjkj on dmms_tjkj.dmz = yjzb.tjkj and dmms_tjkj.dmmc = 'TJKJ' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh order by yjzb.tjrq asc,zb.zbpx
select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,zb.khzbmc,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join khfa_khzb_jg zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and zb.bz = yjzb.bz and zb.sdbs = yjzb.sdbs and zb.tjkj = yjzb.tjkj and zb.khzbdh = $khzb$ inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh where yjzb.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jg.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ order by yjzb.tjrq asc,zb.zbpx
select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,substr(cast(yjzb.tjrq as char(8)),5,4) as tjrq,zb.zbmc, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs,bz.bzzwmc as bz, dmms_tjkj.dmms as tjkj,yjzb.zbz from khdx_jg jg inner join yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb on yjzb.khdxdh = jg.khdxdh inner join khdx_zb zb on zb.zbdh = yjzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = '$bz$' inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz = yjzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs='$sdbs$' and yjzb.tjkj='$tjkj$' and yjzb.zbdh = $zbdh$ inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=zb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' inner join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz = yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc = 'ZBSDBS' inner join csb_dmms dmms_tjkj on dmms_tjkj.dmz = yjzb.tjkj and dmms_tjkj.dmmc = 'TJKJ' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh where yjzb.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ and jg.khdxdh = $jgkhdxdh$ order by yjzb.tjrq asc,zb.zbpx ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khzbdh as KEY,khzbmc as VALUE from khfa_khzb_jg order by zbpx
